name: Helzear Rive Gauche

reviews.text: We've stayed a couple of nights in an upstairs apartment. We had a one bedroom apartment which looked nice and clean. The bathroom was nice, the bed and sofa bed were comfortable. The soundproofing was quite bad as you can hear people upstairs walking and kids playing outside in the morning. Double glazed windows are not common in France...
reviews.title: Nice apartment but disappointing compared to a real hotel

reviews.text: But one thing happened that made us realised it was always better to stay in a real classic hotel. One night, when we came back from dinner, we found a family trying to open its apartment with no success. The key didn't work and they were alone, outside, waiting for some help. We tried calling people from the hotel on their mobile phone but no one answered. With no reception at night, no one could help. So the family left to try to get a room at an hotel nearby, with all their belongings locked in the apartment!
reviews.title: Nice apartment, small but perfect

reviews.text: Staff from the hotel was very kind and helpful when they were here, but when I saw that at night, I thought I'll always go for an hotel with a reception in my future stays...
reviews.title: good choice

reviews.text: 5 of us stayed in the 2 bed apartment in November 2012 - we only stayed for one night so it was fine, if you plan to stay for longer and cook in the apartment book a 3 bed, its very very compact.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: We were met at the apartment by a receptionist who was very friendly and helpful, the only negative is the 1,000 euro deposit charge they put on my credit card, it is refunded within 5 days but really 1,000 deposit, seems a bit steep to me? Most villas ask for less deposit than that!
reviews.title: A very bad experience of these appartments

reviews.text: Thanks to the helzear team for this original experience.Our apartment was so pretty and your staff so kind with us. We would like to test your other residences when we come again in Paris next february !
reviews.title: Charming place

reviews.text: Nice modern apartment furnished with taste. There is a small living room with kitchen. The bedroom was rather small but big enough for the bed and certainly big enough for Paris standards. I was in the ground floor, there are probably better apartments. In garden is lovely and certainly very nice in the Summer.
reviews.title: Nice and modern

reviews.text: The location is nice. Next to a street full of restaurants and very lively at nights with a real choice for food (Rue Dagerre). Surely a good location to discover Paris.
reviews.title: What à wonderful place!

reviews.text: I came much later than expected. My train was considerably delayed. So I did not make it before 10.30 while keeping in touch with the person that waited to give me the key of the apartment. I was surprise not to be charged the extra 70€ and I found this very pleasant after my horror trip.
reviews.title: Our best trip to Paris ever!

reviews.text: The apartment was rather expensive, but it was busy week in Paris and all accommodations in the South of Paris were either booked, overpriced or dodgy. I was happy to find this place.
reviews.title: Good !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent a week-end in Paris with my fiance and the place was perfect for the romantic trip we planned. The site is very cute, with old buildings and a small courtyard where you want to chill out all night long. Inside, you can see they tried to reveal and respect the building as it is, with visible ancient steel beams and bricks. The rooms aren't that large but it's cosy. The decoration is unusual for an hotel, with books and a mix of old and new design furniture, so french !
reviews.title: Great place with character

reviews.text: No warm water, pictures do not correspond to appartment, sold as an appartment for 3 but not enough place. Only for 2. If the second convertable is open there is no more space to move in the room. No space for luggages. No window in the bedroom. Dirty carpet. No clean toilet, No Airco, room was very hot.
reviews.title: don't waste your money, go to one of the many hotels around Montparnasse

description: Enter one of our Rive Gauche Montparnasse Helzear hotel-apartments and discover the luxury and privacy of an environment in which you can feel totally at home. Relax and invite your friends in a refined, contemporary setting, while at the same time enjoying the services of a top hotel. There is a wonderfull garden in the earth of the city : prepare a confidential and peacefull stay in Paris downtonwn
